fields.label: Business/Company Name
fields.summary: Enter the name of the business or company.

fields.label: Business/Company Address
fields.summary: Provide the complete address including unit/block/no, street, subdivision/village, barangay, municipality/city, province, country, and zip code.

fields.label: Name of Contact Person
fields.summary: Enter the full name of the contact person.

fields.label: Position
fields.summary: Specify the position of the contact person.

fields.label: Contact Number(s)
fields.summary: Provide the contact number(s) for the contact person.

fields.label: Email Address(es)
fields.summary: Enter the email address(es) for the contact person.

fields.label: ORGANIC PRODUCT TRADE/BRAND NAME
fields.summary: Specify the trade/brand name of the organic product.

fields.label: GUARANTEED ANALYSIS
fields.summary: Provide the guaranteed analysis of the product.

sections.title: NAME OF ACTIVE INGREDIENT AND PERCENT PURITY (For BCA)

fields.label: NAME OF ACTIVE INGREDIENT AND PERCENT PURITY
fields.summary: Specify the name of the active ingredient and its percent purity.

sections.title: NAME OF MANUFACTURER OF A.I. (For BCA)

fields.label: NAME OF MANUFACTURER OF A.I.
fields.summary: Enter the name of the manufacturer of the active ingredient.

fields.label: ADDRESS
fields.summary: Provide the address of the manufacturer.

fields.label: TEST CROP AND/OR TARGET PEST
fields.summary: Specify the test crop and/or target pest.

fields.label: TOTAL AREA COVERED
fields.summary: Indicate the total area covered for the trial.

fields.label: DURATION OF TRIAL
fields.summary: Specify the duration of the trial.

fields.label: TREATMENT AND METHOD OF APPLICATION
fields.summary: Describe the treatment and method of application.

sections.title: TOTAL AMOUNT OF PRODUCT NEEDED FOR THE TRIAL

fields.label: TOTAL AMOUNT OF PRODUCT NEEDED FOR THE TRIAL
fields.summary: Indicate the total amount of product needed for the trial.

fields.label: LOCATION OF EXPERIMENTAL SITE
fields.summary: Provide the location of the experimental site and attach a location map.

sections.title: NAME OF DA-BAFS OFFICIALLY ACCREDITED ORGANIC AGRICULTURE RESEARCHER (OAR)

fields.label: NAME OF DA-BAFS OFFICIALLY ACCREDITED ORGANIC AGRICULTURE RESEARCHER (OAR)
fields.summary: Enter the name of the accredited organic agriculture researcher.

fields.label: Official Accreditation Number
fields.summary: Provide the official accreditation number.

fields.label: Contact Number(s)
fields.summary: Enter the contact number(s) for the OAR.

fields.label: Email Address(es)
fields.summary: Provide the email address(es) for the OAR.

fields.label: Address
fields.summary: Specify the address of the OAR.

fields.label: Applicant’s Authorized Signature
fields.summary: Sign here.

fields.label: Date
fields.summary: Enter the date of application.
